description: The minimal_password_length parameter in SAP HANA specifies the minimum number of characters that a password must contain.

queries.name: q_password_poilcy_minimal_password_length
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'minimal_password_length'

actions.description: The parameter minimal_password_length is set to a value less than the recommended default value of 8. It is important to note that the minimal_password_length parameter is critical to enhancing the security of SAP HANA. A password that is shorter than 8 characters is more likely to be guessed or cracked, which could allow an unauthorized user to access your system. To improve the security of your SAP HANA system, we recommend that you increase the value of the minimal_password_length parameter to 8 or more.
